tasks.title: Citation Parser Implementation
tasks.review_notes: Implemented in src/parser/citation_extractor.py. Tested with diverse PDFs.
tasks.description: Develop a module to find references like 'BNBest-P' or '§ 44 BHO' in text.
acceptance_criteria: Regex-based extraction of laws and guidelines

tasks.title: Reference Linking
tasks.review_notes: Edges are correctly created in knowledge_graph.json.
tasks.description: Generate REFERENCES edges between document nodes based on citations.

tasks.title: Multi-Hop Retrieval
tasks.review_notes: Logic implemented in src/parser/hybrid_search.py. Verified integration with neighbor context and version warnings.
tasks.description: Implement logic to load neighboring nodes in RAG context via REFERENCES and SUPERSEDES edges.
acceptance_criteria: Handling of SUPERSEDES for version warnings

tasks.title: Dashboard UI Filter Fixes
tasks.review_notes: Filters for ministry and type are now functional.
tasks.description: Repair inactive UI filters in dashboard.html.

tasks.title: Dockerization
tasks.review_notes: Dockerfile and docker-compose.yml created. Backend and Frontend separated.
tasks.description: Create Dockerfiles for Backend and Frontend components.

tasks.title: Full E2E Test Suite
tasks.review_notes: Playwright E2E test covering search, AI answer, and graph context expansion.
tasks.description: Comprehensive E2E tests for the dashboard and search API.
acceptance_criteria: Playwright coverage for all UI elements

tasks.title: Full Crawler Implementation
tasks.review_notes: Implemented EasyCrawler with global recursion, rate limiting, and robust retry logic. Verified with BMWE crawl.
tasks.description: Expand Easy-Online crawler to fetch all available documents from all ministries.
acceptance_criteria: Recursive crawling of all ministry sub-pages
Handling of rate limits and retries
Complete manifest.json generation for the full corpus

tasks.title: Automated Embedding Sync
tasks.review_notes: Successfully generated and uploaded 3,888 chunks to ChromaDB container.
tasks.description: Integrate vector store population into the main pipeline to ensure local embeddings are always up to date with the graph.
acceptance_criteria: New chunks are automatically vectorized and added to ChromaDB
Avoid redundant API calls for existing chunks

tasks.title: Resource & Performance Profiling
tasks.review_notes: Profiling report created in docs/resource_profiling.md. Memory footprint ~800MB peak. HyDE latency identified as bottleneck.
tasks.description: Measure and optimize RAM and CPU usage to ensure the system runs stable on a 4GB VPS.
acceptance_criteria: Memory profiling for NetworkX graph loading
Stable API performance under concurrent requests

tasks.title: Phase 1 Graph RAG: BM25 + RRF + Reranking
tasks.review_notes: Implemented BM25 sparse retrieval, RRF fusion, and cross-encoder reranking. Pipeline is robust and backward compatible.
tasks.description: Implement State-of-the-Art Graph RAG Phase 1: Hybrid retrieval with BM25 sparse retrieval, Reciprocal Rank Fusion, and Cross-Encoder reranking for German legal text.
acceptance_criteria: RRF fusion for combining BM25 + Vector results

tasks.title: Phase 2 Graph RAG: Personalized PageRank & Graph Algorithms
tasks.review_notes: Implemented Personalized PageRank, smart k-hop expansion, temporal filtering, and centrality-based scoring. Integrated into search_v2().
tasks.description: Implement advanced graph algorithms: Personalized PageRank for subgraph extraction, smart k-hop expansion with temporal filtering, and centrality-based scoring.
acceptance_criteria: Smart k-hop expansion with edge filtering
Replace degree-based scoring with PageRank centrality

tasks.title: Phase 3 Graph RAG: Query Enhancement
tasks.review_notes: Implemented QueryEnhancer (Multi-Query, HyDE, Decomposition) and integrated into search_v2(). Verified with tests/test_query_enhancement.py.
tasks.description: Implement query enhancement techniques: Multi-query generation, HyDE (Hypothetical Document Embeddings), and query decomposition.

tasks.title: UX Polish: Auto-Focus & Dynamic Filters
tasks.review_notes: Implemented Auto-Zoom, Dynamic dependent filters, and Category filter. Verified manually and with Playwright script.
tasks.description: Improve dashboard usability with auto-focus on results/filters and intelligent filter dependencies.
acceptance_criteria: Auto-zoom on filter change and search
Dynamic disabling of invalid filter options
Visual polish (Law color orange, Legend text)

tasks.title: Deployment Preparation
tasks.review_notes: Repo cleaned, requirements.txt updated for production/Docker.
tasks.description: Prepare repository for deployment on VPS/Raspberry Pi (cleanup, dependency freeze).

tasks.title: Critical Fixes for VPS Deployment & Automation
tasks.review_notes: Fixed critical Nginx typo, DB connection, and implemented automated vectorization. Fixed Dashboard static file serving.
tasks.description: Resolve critical deployment issues preventing the VPS from serving the API and Graph. Implement cronjob for automation.
acceptance_criteria: VectorStore connects to 'chroma' host in Docker
Dashboard serves JSON data correctly from /data/

tasks.title: Apify Actor Development for Monetization
tasks.description: Develop and publish an Apify Actor to provide the Graph-RAG capabilities as a paid service, ensuring long-term sustainability.
acceptance_criteria: Implement main.py wrapper for search logic

tasks.title: API Endpoint: Context Expansion
tasks.description: Implement POST /api/graph/expand-context endpoint accepting context chunks for compliance mapping.
acceptance_criteria: Basic controller structure returns defined schema

tasks.title: Import SGB V and KHG
tasks.review_notes: Successfully imported SGB V (670 sections) and KHG (61 sections) via Hybrid Law Crawler. Vector store synced.
tasks.description: Import Sozialgesetzbuch V (SGB V) and Krankenhausfinanzierungsgesetz (KHG) into the Knowledge Graph to support healthcare-related funding queries.
acceptance_criteria: Use Hybrid Law Crawler to fetch texts
Add nodes to graph with correct metadata
subtasks: Update Vector Store ingestion logic to support node_type='chunk'

tasks.title: Import VOB/A and VOB/B
tasks.review_notes: Manually imported key sections of VOB/A and VOB/B due to 404s on official sources. Vector store synced.
tasks.description: Import Vergabe- und Vertragsordnung für Bauleistungen (VOB) into the Knowledge Graph.
acceptance_criteria: Nodes for VOB/A and VOB/B in graph

tasks.title: On-Demand Automated Discovery
tasks.review_notes: Connected ComplianceMapper to LawCrawler. Missing laws (e.g., AtG, LuftVG) are now automatically crawled, added to the graph, and vectorized at runtime.
tasks.description: Trigger automated crawling and ingestion when missing laws are detected during compliance mapping.
acceptance_criteria: Graph and Vector Store updated automatically
No redundant crawls for same law
subtasks: Wire vector store update into import flow

tasks.title: Vector Store Performance Optimization
tasks.review_notes: Implemented hybrid storage (JSON + Pickle cache). Startup time reduced from 13s to <2s for 12.5k chunks.
tasks.description: Optimize LiteVectorStore loading speed as dataset grows.
acceptance_criteria: Pickle cache for fast binary access

tasks.title: Reasoning Trace UI & Citation Refinement
tasks.review_notes: Added discovery log overlay and 'Neu entdeckt' badges in dashboard.html. Expanded law regex in CitationExtractor to cover BImSchG, KrWG, HOAI, etc.
tasks.description: Visualize the reasoning process and newly discovered laws in the UI.
acceptance_criteria: New Law Badges in Chat results
subtasks: Update dashboard.html with log and badges

tasks.title: Graph-Analytics & Reporting
tasks.review_notes: Implemented generate_graph_report.py which provides stats on node types, law coverage, and citation centrality.
tasks.description: Automated statistics and reporting for Knowledge Graph health and coverage.

tasks.title: UI-Erweiterung: Regel-Suche
tasks.review_notes: Added real-time search field in dashboard sidebar to filter extracted rules by keyword.
tasks.description: Add search/filter field for rules in the dashboard sidebar.

tasks.title: Expert Knowledge Externalization
tasks.review_notes: Moved hardcoded CONCEPT_MAP to config/compliance_concepts.json. Expanded with AGVO and EU terms.
tasks.description: Move hardcoded CONCEPT_MAP to external JSON config and expand with AGVO/EU concepts.

tasks.title: EU-Beihilferecht Integration (AGVO)
tasks.review_notes: Manually imported Art 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 of AGVO. Syncing confirmed and RAG-ready.
tasks.description: Import key articles of General Block Exemption Regulation (AGVO) into the graph.
acceptance_criteria: References to AGVO recognized in extractor

rules.version_increment: Only increment version when feature is completed AND reviewed
rules.review_policy: Reviews can only be done by NEXT agent, not same agent
hallucination_prevention: Never mark tasks as completed without verification
Always check if files/functions exist before referencing
Update this JSON after every significant change
